hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Azerbaijan: Web Site Publisher Held

abstract.p: Bakhtiyar Hajiyev, youth leader who called for protests against corruption in Azerbaijan and founder of Web site, is arrested; private Azeri organization says site allegedly angered government of Pres Ilham Abiyev (S)

block.p: Bakhtiyar Hajiyev, a youth leader who called for protests against corruption and recent price increases for fuel and utilities, was arrested Saturday, opposition members and advocates for a free press said. Mr. Hajiyev founded a Web site, susmayaq.biz, which translates as ''Let's not keep silent.'' The site apparently angered the government of President Ilham Aliyev, said Emin Huseynov, director of the Institute for Reporters' Freedom and Safety, a private Azeri organization.
